trans-unit.source: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects in SOAP format.
trans-unit.target: 提供若干使用和发布 SOAP 格式的远程对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class makes a link demand.
trans-unit.target: 此类，使链接要求。

trans-unit.source: A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接调用方没有基础结构的权限，则会引发一个安全异常。

trans-unit.source: See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the members in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class to convert between a <xref:System.Type> object and an XML type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的成员<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类之间进行转换<xref:System.Type>对象和 XML 类型。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission Value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The namespace that is to be coded.
trans-unit.target: 要编码的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly that is to be coded.
trans-unit.target: 要编码的程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the common language runtime type namespace name from the provided namespace and assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 返回提供的命名空间和程序集名称中的公共语言运行时类型命名空间名称。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime type namespace name from the provided namespace and assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 提供的命名空间和程序集名称中的公共语言运行时类型命名空间名称。

trans-unit.source: The current method is used by the .NET Framework and the SoapSuds tool to create an XML namespace name for a common language runtime object type.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法由.NET Framework 和 SoapSuds 工具用于创建公共语言运行时对象类型的 XML 命名空间名称。

trans-unit.source: For more information about SoapSuds, see [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5).
trans-unit.target: 有关 SoapSuds 的详细信息，请参阅[Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="assemblyName" /> and <paramref name="typeNamespace" /> parameters are both either <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 和 <paramref name="typeNamespace" /> 参数同为 <see langword="null" /> 或空。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime namespace.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时命名空间。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the decoded namespace name.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，该参数包含保存了已解码命名空间名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the decoded assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，该参数包含保存已解码程序集名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Decodes the XML namespace and assembly names from the provided common language runtime namespace.
trans-unit.target: 对提供的公共语言运行时命名空间中的 XML 命名空间和程序集名称进行解码。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the namespace and assembly names were successfully decoded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名空间和程序集名称被成功解码，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 分析 XML 流时，它需要知道如何将转换到公共语言运行时类型从流中读取的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 指定应生成.NET Framework 的方式的信息和 XML 流存储在位于的自定义特性中的分析<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法能够在配置文件中指定此信息： 通过显式指定映射，或通过指定要预加载的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The current method supports the retrieval of such mappings.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法支持检索这些映射。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="inNamespace" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inNamespace" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或为空。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: 包含该字段的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML attribute name of the field type.
trans-unit.target: 该字段类型的 XML 特性名。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the field type.
trans-unit.target: 该字段类型的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the field.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含该字段的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the name of the field.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含保存该字段名的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves field type from XML attribute name, namespace, and the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the containing object.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 特性名、命名空间和包含对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中检索字段类型。

trans-unit.source: Given the type of the containing object and the XML attribute and XML namespace that is read in by the .NET Framework, the current method returns the actual common language runtime field name and type of the field.
trans-unit.target: 给定的包含对象的 XML 属性和.NET Framework 中读取的 XML 命名空间的类型，当前方法返回的实际公共语言运行时字段名称和类型的字段。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework then uses this information to populate that field with the data read in from the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 然后使用此信息从 XML 流中读取的数据填充该字段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: 包含该字段的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML element name of field.
trans-unit.target: 字段的 XML 元素名。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the field type.
trans-unit.target: 该字段类型的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the field.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含该字段的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the name of the field.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含保存该字段名的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> and name of a field from the provided XML element name, namespace, and the containing type.
trans-unit.target: 检索提供的 XML 元素名、命名空间和包含类型中的某字段的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 和名称。

trans-unit.source: Given the type of the containing object and the XML element and XML namespace that is read in by the .NET Framework, this method returns the actual common language runtime field name and type of the field.
trans-unit.target: 给定的包含对象的 XML 元素和.NET Framework 中读取的 XML 命名空间的类型，此方法返回的实际公共语言运行时字段名称和类型的字段。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework then uses this information to populate that field with the data read in from the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 然后使用此信息从 XML 流中读取的数据填充该字段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The XML element name of the unknown object type.
trans-unit.target: 未知对象类型的 XML 元素名。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the unknown object type.
trans-unit.target: 未知对象类型的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that should be used during deserialization of an unrecognized object type with the given XML element name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 检索在反序列化具有给定 XML 元素名和命名空间的无法识别的对象类型时应使用的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of object associated with the specified XML element name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 与指定的 XML 元素名和命名空间关联的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The current method returns values set up through <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.RegisterInteropXmlElement%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.PreLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法返回值通过设置<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.RegisterInteropXmlElement%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.PreLoad%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The XML type of the unknown object type.
trans-unit.target: 未知对象类型的 XML 类型。

trans-unit.source: The XML type namespace of the unknown object type.
trans-unit.target: 未知对象类型的 XML 类型命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that should be used during deserialization of an unrecognized object type with the given XML type name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化具有给定 XML 类型名称和命名空间的无法识别的对象类型时，检索应使用的对象 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of object associated with the specified XML type name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 与指定的 XML 类型名称和命名空间关联的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The current method returns values set up through <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.RegisterInteropXmlType%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.PreLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法返回值通过设置<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.RegisterInteropXmlType%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.PreLoad%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> that contains the method for which a SOAPAction is requested.
trans-unit.target: 包含为其请求 SOAPAction 的方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the SOAPAction value associated with the method specified in the given <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回与给定 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> 中指定的方法关联的 SOAPAction 值。

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction value associated with the method specified in the given <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 与给定 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> 中指定的方法关联的 SOAPAction 值。

trans-unit.source: If the given <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> has not been registered with any SOAPAction value, the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.GetSoapActionFromMethodBase%2A> method returns the SOAPAction automatically cached with the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>尚未注册任何 SOAPAction 值，<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.GetSoapActionFromMethodBase%2A>方法返回与自动缓存 SOAPAction <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction of the method for which the type and method names were requested.
trans-unit.target: 为其请求类型和方法名的方法的 SOAPAction。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the type name of the method in question.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，该参数包含保存了相关方法的类型名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the method name of the method in question.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，该参数包含保存了相关方法的方法名的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Determines the type and method name of the method associated with the specified SOAPAction value.
trans-unit.target: 确定与指定的 SOAPAction 值关联的方法的类型和方法名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type and method name were successfully recovered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型和方法名成功恢复，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: `true` if the type and method name lookups were successful; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 如果类型和方法名称查找已成功;否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction value does not start and end with quotes.
trans-unit.target: SOAPAction 值不以引号开头和结尾。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The object <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for which the XML element and namespace names were requested.
trans-unit.target: 为其请求 XML 元素和命名空间名称的对象 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the XML element name of the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，该参数包含保存了指定对象类型的 XML 元素名的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that holds the XML namespace name of the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，该参数包含保存了指定对象类型的 XML 命名空间名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Returns XML element information that should be used when serializing the given type.
trans-unit.target: 返回在序列化给定类型时应使用的 XML 元素信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the requested values have been set flagged with <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求值已用 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute" /> 设置了标志，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> of the method for which the XML namespace was requested.
trans-unit.target: 为其请求 XML 命名空间的方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the XML namespace used during remote calls of the method specified in the given <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索在远程调用给定 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> 中指定的方法时使用的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace used during remote calls of the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 在远程调用指定方法时使用的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the XML namespace used during the generation of responses to the remote call to the method specified in the given <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace used during the generation of responses to a remote method call.
trans-unit.target: 在生成对远程方法调用的响应时使用的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.target: 指定对象 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的 XML 类型。

trans-unit.source: The XML type namespace of the specified object <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定对象 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的 XML 类型命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Returns XML type information that should be used when serializing the given <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回在序列化给定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 时应使用的 XML 类型信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the requested values have been set flagged with <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求值已用 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute" /> 设置了标志，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The namespace to check in the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 要签入公共语言运行时的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified namespace is native to the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示指定的命名空间是否是公共语言运行时的本机命名空间。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the given namespace is native to the common language runtime; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的命名空间是公共语言运行时的本机命名空间，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current method is used by the SoapSuds tool to determine whether an XML namespace represents a common language runtime type or a type from a non-common language runtime system.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法 SoapSuds 工具用于确定 XML 命名空间从非公共语言运行时系统是否表示公共语言运行时类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about SoapSuds, see [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5).
trans-unit.target: 有关 SoapSuds 的详细信息，请参阅[Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> the specified SOAPAction is checked against.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 SOAPAction 检查所依据的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified SOAPAction is acceptable for a given <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified SOAPAction is acceptable for a given <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> 可以接受指定的 SOAPAction，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Preloads specified types based on values set in the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute" /> applied to the types.
trans-unit.target: 根据在应用于各个类型的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute" /> 中设置的值预加载指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> for each type of which to call <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.PreLoad(System.Type)" />.
trans-unit.target: 为其每种类型均调用 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 的 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices.PreLoad(System.Type)" />。

trans-unit.source: Preloads every <see cref="T:System.Type" /> found in the specified <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> from the information found in the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute" /> associated with each type.
trans-unit.target: 根据在与每个类型关联的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中的信息预加载位于指定 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 中的每个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 分析 XML 流时，它需要知道如何将转换到公共语言运行时类型从流中读取的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 指定应生成.NET Framework 的方式的信息和 XML 流存储在位于的自定义特性中的分析<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法能够在配置文件中指定此信息： 通过显式指定映射，或通过指定要预加载的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The custom attributes are read during the preloading process and the information in them is made available to the SOAP parser.
trans-unit.target: 在预加载过程中读取的自定义特性，并且在它们中的信息可用于 SOAP 分析器。

trans-unit.source: When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 分析 XML 流时，它需要知道如何将转换到公共语言运行时类型从流中读取的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 指定应生成.NET Framework 的方式的信息和 XML 流存储在位于的自定义特性中的分析<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法能够在配置文件中指定此信息： 通过显式指定映射，或通过指定要预加载的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The custom attributes are read during the preloading process and the information in them is made available to the SOAP parser.
trans-unit.target: 在预加载过程中读取的自定义特性，并且在它们中的信息可用于 SOAP 分析器。

trans-unit.source: Associates a SOAPAction value with the provided <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 SOAPAction 值与提供的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> 关联。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> of the method to associate with the SOAPAction cached with it.
trans-unit.target: 方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />，与用其缓存的 SOAPAction 关联。

trans-unit.source: Associates the specified <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> with the SOAPAction cached with it.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> 与用其缓存的 SOAPAction 关联。

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction of the specified method is contained in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute.SoapAction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, or is read off the wire.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的指定方法的 SOAPAction<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute.SoapAction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，或从网络中读取。

trans-unit.source: The current method associates the SOAPAction with the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> for use in channel sinks.
trans-unit.target: 当前方法将关联与 SOAPAction<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>在信道接收器中使用。

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: SOAPAction HTTP 请求标头字段指示 SOAP HTTP 请求的意图。

trans-unit.source: The value is a URI identifying the intent.
trans-unit.target: 值是标识意图的 URI。

trans-unit.source: SOAP places no restrictions on the format or specificity of the URI or that it is resolvable.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 格式或者特殊性 URI 上放置不受限制或它是可解析。

trans-unit.source: An HTTP client must use this header field when issuing a SOAP HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 颁发 SOAP HTTP 请求时，HTTP 客户端必须使用此标头字段。

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request.

trans-unit.source: The value is a URI identifying the intent.
trans-unit.target: 值是标识意图的 URI。

trans-unit.source: SOAP places no restrictions on the format or specificity of the URI or that it is resolvable.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 格式或者特殊性 URI 上放置不受限制或它是可解析。

trans-unit.source: An HTTP client must use this header field when issuing a SOAP HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 颁发 SOAP HTTP 请求时，HTTP 客户端必须使用此标头字段。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML namespace prefix for common language runtime types.
trans-unit.target: 获取公共语言运行时类型的 XML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace prefix for common language runtime types.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时类型的 XML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 和 SOAP 协议编码为 XML 命名空间的公共语言运行时类。

trans-unit.source: The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 当前的属性指定的 XML 命名空间的格式。

trans-unit.source: All XML namespaces for a common language runtime class start with the <xref:System.String> that the current property returns.
trans-unit.target: 有关公共语言运行时类的所有 XML 命名空间都开头<xref:System.String>当前属性返回。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has an assembly, but no native namespace.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于具有程序集但没有本机命名空间的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: The default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has an assembly, but no native namespace.
trans-unit.target: 默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于具有程序集但没有本机命名空间的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 和 SOAP 协议编码为 XML 命名空间的公共语言运行时类。

trans-unit.source: The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 当前的属性指定的 XML 命名空间的格式。

trans-unit.source: If a common language runtime class has an assembly but no namespace, the current property returns the default XML namespace that is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果公共语言运行时类具有程序集但不是在命名空间，当前的属性将返回使用的默认 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that is part of the mscorlib.dll file.
trans-unit.target: 获取 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于作为 mscorlib.dll 文件组成部分的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that is part of the mscorlib.dll file.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于作为 mscorlib.dll 文件组成部分的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 和 SOAP 协议编码为 XML 命名空间的公共语言运行时类。

trans-unit.source: The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 当前的属性指定的 XML 命名空间的格式。

trans-unit.source: If a common language runtime class is part of the mscorlib assembly, the XML namespace returned by the current property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果公共语言运行时类是 mscorlib 程序集的一部分，则使用当前的属性返回的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has both a common language runtime namespace and an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于既具有公共语言运行时命名空间也具有程序集的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: The default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has both a common language runtime namespace and an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 默认的 XML 命名空间前缀，该前缀应该用于既具有公共语言运行时命名空间也具有程序集的公共语言运行时类的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 和 SOAP 协议编码为 XML 命名空间的公共语言运行时类。

trans-unit.source: The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 当前的属性指定的 XML 命名空间的格式。

trans-unit.source: If a common language runtime class has an assembly and a common language runtime namespace, the current property returns the default XML namespace that is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果公共语言运行时类具有程序集和公共语言运行时命名空间，当前的属性将返回使用的默认 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices>类。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: for operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。
